Lab25

Researh

Lab25 is an important research center in Experimental Psychology in Mexico. We have several areas of study, but all of them are focus on behavior adaptability.

Among our areas of main interest are: Learning, Game Theory, Risky choice, Intertemporal Choice, Perception, Categorization.

  • github.com/BouzasLab25
